pageContext.claim: “You know, I did actually a lot better than people thought with African-American voters or probably I wouldn’t be sitting behind this desk. But now my numbers are much higher than they were, and Kanye West was a part of it. And so is Tiger.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is relying on a single Republican-leaning poll, Rasmussen Reports, which has a poor record of accuracy. Most polls including those from Gallup, Ipsos/Reuters and Quinnipiac University found the president's approval rating among African-American voters was relatively stable throughout 2018, ranging between 10-15 percent on average.
